title: Daigaku Nyuugakuji Kara Uwasa Sareteita Bishoujo San Shimai, Ikiwakareteita Gimai Datta.
alternative_title: 大学入学時から噂されていた美少女三姉妹、生き別れていた義妹だった。 ; Daigaku Nyuugaku Ji kara Uwasa Sareteita Bishoujo San Shimai, Ikiwakareteita Gimai Datta ; The Three Beautiful Sisters Rumored Since College Entrance Were Actually My Long-Lost Stepsisters.
status: 大学入学時から噂されていた美少女三姉妹、生き別れていた義妹だった。 ; Daigaku Nyuugaku Ji kara Uwasa Sareteita Bishoujo San Shimai, Ikiwakareteita Gimai Datta ; The Three Beautiful Sisters Rumored Since College Entrance Were Actually My Long-Lost Stepsisters.
description:
Description :
        The three sisters, once clingy and needy as children, have now grown into beautiful young women—and for some reason, they've developed a strong possessive streak!
This youth romance-comedy kicks off as they reunite, and the beautiful trio start competing for attention!
